column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe fi Gilgal baa Bokim (Bokim). Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Mara na memaa hom fi Egypt firii na medze hom aba asaase a mekaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no do
column5: Moronnto menye hom ntamu ahyɛmu no dabiarada:"

column2: "na mma hom nnye asaase yi do atsefo no nndzi ahyɛmu: hom mbubu hɔn afɔrmbukyia no: naaso hom enntsie me ndze: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom ayɛ iyi?"
"Dɛm ntsi na mo so mesee dɛ
column3: murunntu hɔn mmfi hom enyim; mbom wɔbɛyɛ dɛ nsoɛ wɔ hom mfemu
column4: na hɔn enyame ayɛ efir ama hom."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a EWURADZE no bɔfoe no kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Israelmba no nyinara no
column4: ɔman no maa hɔn ndze do na wosui."

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ bea no ne dzin Bokim ase nye Nyinsuwakyifo: na wɔbɔɔ okum afɔr wɔ hɔ maa EWURADZE."
"Afei aber a Josua gyaa ɔman no kwan no
column3: Israelmba mu nyimpa biara kɔr n’egyapadze do dɛ ɔrekɛfa asaase no."

column2: "Na ɔman no soom EWURADZE Josua ne nda nyinara
column3: na mpanyimfo a Josua wui gyaa hɔn no a wohun ndwuma akɛse nyinara a EWURADZE yɛe maa Israel no hɔn nda nyinara."

column2: "Na Josua Nun ne babanyin no
column4: nna oedzi mfe ɔha nye du."

column2: "Na wokesiee no wɔ n’asaase he do wɔ Timnat-heres
column4: wɔ bepɔw Gaas no kwaamu afamu."

column2: "Na ebusuasantsen no nyinara so kɛkaa hɔn egyanom ho wɔ nsamankyir: na afei ebusuasantsen fofor so soɛree dzii hɔn ekyir a nna wonnyim EWURADZE
column3: na dwuma a odzii maa Israel no."

column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
"na wɔpoow EWURADZE
column3: hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn no a oyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do no
column4: na wokedzii enyame fofor a wofi aman a wɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no hɔn enyame no mu ekyir
column5: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa hɔn

column2: "Na wɔpoow EWURADZE
"Na EWURADZE n’ebufuw dzɛɛw Israel do
column3: na oyii hɔn hyɛɛ afowfo a wɔfoow hɔn nsa
column4: na ɔtɔɔn hɔn dze hyɛɛ hɔn atamfo a wɔabɔ hɔn ho aprɔw no nsa
column5: ma woenntum enngyina hɔn atamfo enyim bio."

column2: "Beebiara a wopuei kɔree no
column3: EWURADZE ne nsa nye hɔn dzii no bɔn
column5: na dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kaa ntam kyerɛɛ hɔn no: na hɔn ho hiahiaa hɔn yie."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE maa banodzifo do ma wɔgyee hɔn nkwa fii hɔn a wɔfoom hɔn fae no nsamu."
"Iyi nyinara ekyir no
column4: na wodzii enyame fofor ekyir ndwamanyɛ mu
column5: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze maa hɔn: ntsɛmara na wɔdanee fii ɔkwan a hɔn egyanom nantseew do tsiee EWURADZE mbransɛm no do; hɔn dze

column2: "Na sɛ EWURADZE ma banodzifo do ma hɔn a
column3: nna EWURADZE edzi banodzinyi no ekyir
column4: na ɔagye hɔn efi hɔn atamfo no nsamu wɔ banodzinyi no ne nda nyinara mu: na osian hɔn apensi a ɔnam hɔn a wɔhaaw hɔn na woyii hɔn ahomtsew do no ntsi ɔyɛɛ EWURADZE yaw."

column2: "Naaso ɔbaa dɛ sɛ banodzinyi no wu a
column5: dɛ wokedzi enyame fofor ekyir som hɔn
column6: na wɔbɔ hɔn mu adze ma hɔn; woenngyaa hɔn ndzeyɛɛ no
column7: na woemmfi hɔn akɔnkye kwan do so."

column2: "Na EWURADZE n’ebufuw dzɛɛw wɔ Israel do; na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ ɔman yi ato m’ahyɛmu a mehyɛɛ hɔn egyanom

column2: "emi so ɔdzekɔr yi murunntu amanaman a Josua wui daan hɔn gyae no mu biara bio:"
"ma medze hɔn asɔ Israel ahwɛ
column3: kyerɛ dɛ wɔbɔhwɛ EWURADZE no kwan no anantsew do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom hwɛe no

column2: "Nna EWURADZE gyaa amanaman no
column3: ɔammpɛ ntsɛm enntu hɔn; nkyii so oennyi hɔn annhyɛ Josua ne nsa."
